.. Hydra Of Python translate documentation master file, created by
   sphinx-quickstart on Mon Oct  7 17:01:40 2019.
   You can adapt this file completely to your liking, but it should at least
   contain the root `toctree` directive.

데이터베이스를 위한 Node.js 기반 ORM 라이브러리 V5
=====================================================

해당 문서는 sequelize_ **5 버전** 기준으로 작성된 문서입니다.

* 번역자: 박정태_

* 저장소: 여기_

* 공식문서: sequelize_

.. _박정태: https://github.com/pjt3591oo
.. _여기: https://github.com/pjt3591oo/sequelizejs_translate
.. _sequelize: https://sequelize.org/master/index.html
